hero.subtitle: Minimalism has become part of Codreanu's philosophy.
hero.description: And this is not a tribute to fashion, but a conscious decision. We know that how a product looks is as important as how it feels.

products.description1: BABA body and hand cream is a new product from Codreanu series of the same name, a care ritual filled with the strength and warmth of ancient traditions.
products.description2: Body cream / 25th hours. Moments free from endless affairs and thoughts. An opportunity to find time for yourself in the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
